name: BlockHell - "Confined"
description:
BulletHellJam 2022 04 : Theme "confined"

Contain the enemies without confining you

First Game, First Jam :D

Solo Project

Controls :

- Screenshot : "PrintScreen"

- Shoot : right trigger | left/right mouse button

- Aim : right stick | mouse position

- Movements : left stick | wasd/zqsd/arrow

- Back to Main Menu : "back" | escape

Tips :

If you are blocked, move, the block will disappear

Assets :

- kenney.nl

- opengamearts  : "magic orb" ; "space boss battle them" by Matthew Pablo
